product_name: Sherpani Zoe String Cross-Body Wallet - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Just the right size for a night on the town, this cross-body wallet holds your phone, cards and coins and zips closed so it all stays inside if you're dancing or dashing to catch a train.
short_description: Just the right size for a night on the town, this cross-body wallet holds your phone, cards and coins and zips closed so it all stays inside if you're dancing or dashing to catch a train.
